name: Entrance
desc: Entrance to a dark room in a long forgotten and ruined castle.

name: Corridor
desc: A mysterious candle lit corridor with a very old and musty carpet

name: Kitchen
desc: As soon as you enter this room, you can smell some freshly baked bread with a side of butter.  You donâ€™t know who made it or why it was here, but the aroma was blissful.

name: Armory
desc: A room is grimy with bottles and bags that litter the room along with rusted weapons which seem to be useless.
